title: Enterprise Agentic AI Production Readiness Checklist Template

items.text: System architecture diagrams available and current
Integration points with existing systems identified
Autonomy levels and decision boundaries specified
Fallback mechanisms for agent failures designed
Data freshness and update mechanisms defined
API authentication and rate limiting in place
Token management and rotation procedures defined
Data retention and deletion policies defined
AI model versioning and provenance tracked
Regulatory requirements identified (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC 2, etc.)
Load testing completed for expected traffic
Stress testing performed beyond normal capacity
Custom metrics for AI agents implemented
Bias detection and fairness metrics implemented
Integration with incident management tools completed
Sensitive data scrubbing in logs verified
Performance tracing for AI operations enabled
Integration tests for all major workflows
End-to-end tests for critical user paths
Model bias and fairness testing completed
Edge case and boundary testing conducted
A/B testing framework for AI models implemented
Feature flags implemented for gradual rollout
Incident severity levels and response times defined
Common failure scenarios and solutions documented
Database schema and migration docs current
AI model documentation and metadata complete
Support team trained on new functionality
Marketing and sales team alignment confirmed
User training and onboarding plan prepared
